resources.string: We need your permission to access your device\'s location.
The location service doesn\'t seem to be available, would you like to check it now?
Button to search a location with the inputed data.
The inputted data is not valid. Take this as example \"Belo Horizonte: -19.9316445, 43.9241857\", in order of latitude and longitude.
Input the name of location, latitude and longitude as this example (Empire State Building: 40.748581712174996, -73.98565618480232). After that, tap in this button to find the location.
